server.name: com.teamwork/mcp
server.description: The Teamwork.com official MCP server helps teams efficiently manage client projects with AI.

environmentVariables.description: API key generated from the Teamwork.com OAuth2 process: https://apidocs.teamwork.com/guides/teamwork/app-login-flow
environmentVariables.name: TW_MCP_BEARER_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Choose log output format between 'text' or 'json'. Default is 'text'.
environmentVariables.name: TW_MCP_LOG_FORMAT

environmentVariables.description: Choose log level between 'debug', 'info', 'warn' or 'error'. Default is 'info'.
environmentVariables.name: TW_MCP_LOG_LEVEL

headers.description: API key generated from the Teamwork.com OAuth2 process: https://apidocs.teamwork.com/guides/teamwork/app-login-flow
headers.name: Authorization

headers.description: API key generated from the Teamwork.com OAuth2 process: https://apidocs.teamwork.com/guides/teamwork/app-login-flow
headers.name: Authorization
